iep_goals: Access school building and classrooms safely using mobility equipment with 100% independence
Complete laboratory science experiments using adaptive equipment with 80% accuracy
accommodations: Accessible seating arrangements and lab stations
Extended time for assignments requiring fine motor skills
Elevator access and modified evacuation procedures
learning_styles: learns well through verbal instruction and discussion

interviews.parent: Parent reports Trevor is determined to pursue engineering and doesn't let physical challenges limit his goals.
interviews.teacher: Trevor is an excellent student who problem-solves creatively and helps other students with academic concepts.

observations.psychologist: Above-average intellectual abilities with strong problem-solving skills. Demonstrates resilience and leadership qualities.
